sentences.sContent: ...a new social class composed largely of war profiteers and gangsters.
sentences.sCn: ...主要由战争投机商和强盗组成的一个新的社会阶层。

remMethod.val: 来自profit (利润) + eer (人) → 只追求利益之人 → 奸商

trans.tranCn: 奸商， 乘机获暴利者
trans.tranOther: If you describe someone as a profiteer, you are critical of them because they make large profits by charging high prices for goods that are hard to get
